text: Sonic Firestorm is the second studio album by English power metal band DragonForce released through on May 11, 2004. ==Track listing== All songs arranged by Sam Totman, Herman Li, Vadim Pruzhanov, ZP Theart, and Adrian Lambert. ==Personnel== ===Band members=== *ZP Theart – vocals, backing vocals *Herman Li – lead and rhythm guitars, acoustic guitars *Sam Totman – lead and rhythm guitars, acoustic guitars *Vadim Pruzhanov – keyboards, piano, acoustic guitars *Dave Mackintosh – drums *Adrian Lambert - bass ===Guest musicians=== *Clive Nolan – backing vocals ===Technical staff=== *Karl Groom – mixing, engineering *Richard West - mixing, vocal recording *Eberhard Köhler – mastering ===Graphic designers=== *Marko Jakobi – album cover artwork *Marisa Jacobi – booklet design *Olle Carson – photography Category:Power metal Category:DragonForce Category:2004 albums
title: Sonic Firestorm
